name: Equilibrate - The Balance Game
description:
The building blocks come to life at night...
Equilibrate is the addictive physics based balance game. Build a tower using blocks without any falling off the screen. It is a skill and logic game for all ages. Finish the 25 levels and beat the high scores. It is the ad-supported full version.

* 25 levels
* Cute 3D characters and graphics
* Physics based gameplay
* Pleasant background music
* Playful sound effects
* Particles and special effects

The game supports iPad, iPhone and iPod Touch!
